summary: Build an Android-installable PWA version of the provided Nifty Options calculator that runs on mobile and focuses on calculation-only functionality.
architectural_notes: Target delivery as a Progressive Web App (PWA) installable on Android (Add to Home Screen).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal calculator app icon (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimal calculator app icon (app-icon.dim_192x192.png)
- Minimal maskable calculator app icon (app-icon-maskable.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Make the React app an Android-installable Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be added to the home screen and launches in standalone mode.
Implement the app as a calculation-only mobile experience: users can enter inputs on-device and immediately see computed outputs without requiring any network calls.
Ensure the app does not depend on live data fetching for core functionality and remains functional when offline.

Design and apply a coherent mobile-first visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) appropriate for a focused calculator tool, and use it consistently across the app (avoid blue/purple defaults).
Add required PWA static assets (icons) under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the manifest so Android uses the correct icons (including a maskable icon variant if supported).

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert provided HTML/CSS/JS into an Android-installable PWA (Add to Home Screen)
Implement calculation-only mode for mobile (no live data fetch required)
